text:
01 of 09 Parents-to-Be! Jinger (Duggar) Vuolo and her husband Jeremy Vuolo announced in early January that they are expecting their first child, due in July. "The past fourteen months have been the best of our lives as we have had the wonderful privilege of beginning our journey through life together in marriage. We both looked forward to the joys of marriage but neither one of us fully understood just how amazing the start of this journey would be. Truly, the Lord's mercies are new every morning!" the couple wrote on their website. "Now, the journey has taken an exciting turn: we are expecting our first child!" they continued. "We are praising God for this beautiful gift and ask that you join us in praying for a safe and healthy pregnancy."

02 of 09 15-Week Baby Bump Jinger Vuolo The pregnant Counting On star gave her fans and followers the first glimpse of her growing belly at the 15-week mark. "Baby Vuolo is growing!" Jinger captioned a smiling photo of herself wearing a fitted black T-shirt and standing next to a chalkboard that reads, "15 weeks" and "baby is the size of an apple." She added the hashtags, "#15weeks #babybump #babyisthesizeofanapple #pregnantmama."

03 of 09 18-Week Baby Bump Jinger Vuolo/Instagram "Update on Baby Vuolo 👶🏼" Jinger captioned an Instagram shot in February, in which she posed with her side to the camera to provide a good glimpse of her growing belly. "Baby is the size of a bell pepper" was also scribbled on the chalkboard with an illustration of the veggie.

04 of 09 20-Week Baby Bump Jinger Vuolo/Instagram "20 weeks Baby is the size of an artichoke," Jinger wrote on her black chalkboard in March. She captioned the image, "👶🏼 Vuolo #20weeks."

05 of 09 22-Week Baby Bump Jinger Vuolo/Instagram The mama-to-be snapped a photo of her 22-week belly on Instagram in March. For the photo, Jinger was all smiles as she wore a fitted black T-shirt while standing beside a black chalkboard that read, "22 weeks" and "Baby is the size of a … papaya."

06 of 09 25-Week Baby Bump "25 weeks," Jinger wrote on her black chalkboard about her 25-week bump. "Baby is the size of a ... cauliflower."

07 of 09 It's a Girl! After months of mounting anticipation, the parents-to-be learned the sex of their baby through a relay race completed by friends and family in Laredo, Texas, in April. "We are so happy to announce that we are having a little baby girl!" they told PEOPLE. "We could not be more excited and are eagerly anticipating meeting our little lady this summer. We especially love thinking forward and realizing that she will have excellent role models in both of her grandmothers, who cannot wait to shower her with love."

08 of 09 31-Week Baby Bump Jinger Vuolo/Instagram In May, the pregnant Counting On star posted a picture of herself standing beside her black chalkboard, which reads, "31 weeks Baby is the size of a … pineapple." For the snap, Jinger wore a fitted black T-shirt, which she's worn in each of her progress shots. "Baby Girl Vuolo 👶🏼💕#31weeks," she captioned the photo.
title: Jinger Duggar Pregnant: See Photos of Her Baby Bump

meta_data.description: Jinger Duggar is pregnant with her first child, a baby girl, due in July
meta_data.sailthru.author: Natalie Stone
